snippet: Angry Iranians commemorated the taking of the American Embassy in Tehran in 1979, and a senior security official warned against any compromise with the “great Satan.”
lead_paragraph: Angry Iranians commemorated the taking of the American Embassy in Tehran in 1979, and a senior security official warned against any compromise with the “great Satan.”

headline.seo: Iranian Hard-Liners Reject Any Talks WIth U.S.
headline.main: Iranian Hard-Liners Reject Any Talks With U.S.
headline.print_headline: Iranian Hard-Liners Reject Any Overtures to Washington
